properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 10 at 10:32AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Flood
Advisory for the Fox River...

Fox River at Montgomery affecting Kane and Kendall Counties

The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation as well
as forecast precipitation 24-48 hours into the future. This forecast
is heavily dependent upon the exact location of precipitation that
occurs later today into Saturday, as well as the how much falls
as rain instead of ice/snow.

The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Fox River at Montgomery, or from Red Gate Road in St. Charles
downstream to Millington.
* from late tonight until further notice.
* At  945 AM Friday the stage was 12.3 feet.
* Action stage is 12.5 feet.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will rise to near near flood stage by early Sunday
morning.
* Impact...At 13.0 feet...Water overtops low-lying banks near
Montgomery, St. Charles, and Clark Island Park in Batavia.
properties.instruction:
Safety message...If you encounter a flooded roadway...turn around and
find an alternate route.

Additional information can be found at weather.gov/chicago.
